effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 752,783 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 317,111.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 8,355 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 2,492 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
